product_name: Topeak Shock n' Roll Bike Pump
long_description: The Topeak Shock n' Roll bike pump does double-duty when it comes to priming your mountain bike's air-based suspension or inflating your bike's tires. 2-setting pressure selector makes it easy to achieve high pressures for suspension forks and shocks or low pressure/high volume for mountain bike tires. Air-bleed valve lets you relieve pressure when you over inflate without having to disconnect the pump. Built-in guage makes it easy to manage pressures; reads up to 300 psi (20.7 bar). Compact, CNC'd aluminum construction on the Topeak Shock n' Roll bike pump ensures resilient performance and easy storage in your pack. Flexible hose has a head that threads directly onto Presta or Schrader valves (including shock valves) with no need to change internal parts or use extra adaptors.
short_description: The Topeak Shock n' Roll bike pump does double-duty when it comes to priming your mountain bike's air-based suspension or inflating your bike's tires.
